channel.title: Need some cerious help with my server
channel.description:
rite hi peeps i have a server n i have a compilier called build i code in my client file n press compile n it says finsih n i think it does it but igo on server but it hasnt updated it n the other thing it i have no-ip but in the splash screen thing it dosent show my hosts like eg pooscape.no-ip.org or something.
if u can help me i will make u co- on my server add my msn geodude08@hotmail.com
ty peeps

item.title: Need some cerious help with my server

@geodude08 wrote:

u dont get it the ip e.g:poopscape dosent even show up in the no-ip client lol

Read full topic
item.source: Need some cerious help with my server

item.title: Need some cerious help with my server
item.dc:creator: @jarrad jarrad
item.description:
@jarrad wrote:

No offence but some decent grammar + Spelling would do thanks -

Go to Hosts/Redirects tab (Logged in) Then Add host…
Type in the server IP you want I.E Pooscape.no-ip.org and then refresh server list,
Open up No-ip DUC Client and then tick your box with the ip in.

Then go to your server files, Run Server, And it should work!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @buckybkatt buckybkatt
item.description:
@buckybkatt wrote:

for the no-ip problem…
-did you acctually make your host on the website?
-did you right click on click ‘refresh host list’
-have you signed into your proper account?

i had the same prob
